amendatorysection.catchline: District; recreation area; permit sales; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: (1) A district may permit the sale, trade, or vending of any goods, products, or commodities of any type in a recreation area.
(2) Any person who sells, trades, or vends any goods, products, or commodities of any type in a recreation area when not permitted by the district shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.
